3:
--------------------
Text: Keyboard glockenspiel:  Half a century later, Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart employed a "strumento d’acciaio" in "The Magic Flute" (1791) to represent Papageno's magic bells, and this instrument is believed to have been a keyboard glockenspiel.

Triplets:<Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

--------------------
<Text: Keyboard glockenspiel:  This part is nowadays sometimes taken by a celesta.>
